eb:/ipfs/QmSkJtcfWo7c42KnL5hho6GFxK6HRNV91XABx1P7xDtfLV"]}},"version":1}

params._controller: The controller to be configured with a worker.
params._worker: The worker to be set for the newly configured controller. _worker must not be a non-zero address. To disable a worker, use removeController instead.

params._newAllowance: New allowance to be set for minter.

incrementMinterAllowance(uint256).details: An minter is considered active if minterManager.isMinter(minter) returns true.

owner().details: Tells the address of the owner

params._newMinterManager: The address of the new minterManager contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

configureController(address,address).notice: Configure a controller with the given worker.

configureMinter(uint256).notice: Enables the minter and sets its allowance.

decrementMinterAllowance(uint256).notice: decreases the minter allowance if and only if the minter is currently active. The controller can safely send a signed decrementMinterAllowance() transaction to a minter and not worry about it being used to undo a removeMinter() transaction.

incrementMinterAllowance(uint256).notice: Increases the minter's allowance if and only if the minter is an active minter.

removeController(address).notice: disables a controller by setting its worker to address(0).
